I. Gii thiu chung: - Tr chi C Tin vi cch chi n gin l nhm vo c v nh n sao cho bn trng c. Mi phng chi s c 4 ngi chi, mi ngi c th la chn v a ra cch chi ca ring mnh bn c nhiu c nht II. Cc loi Sng : - V kh lun l vt bt ly thn trong mi cuc chin. i vi C Tin, sng cng l loi v kh duy nht cc tay thin x khng nh sc mnh bn thn. - Game C Tin c 5 loi sng khc nhau. 5 loi sng c gi tr n bn ra khc nhau s c sc st thng khc nhau gip bn trit h nhng loi c to nhanh hn. Sng c gi tr cng ln s c kh nng git c cng nhanh. - Sng cng mnh ngi chi cng d git c to (nhng s tn nhiu $ hn cho 1 ln bn). Ngi chi c th thay i sng lin tc ngm bn nhng loi c m mnh mong mun. - S dng sng chin tht ng thi im cng l 1 b quyt ngi chi ginh c chin thng. III. Cc loi c di i dng: - Di bin su l ni sinh sng ca rt nhiu loi c vi kch thc v hnh dng khc nhau. Tng ng vi mi loi c t l thng khc nhau. Sau y l t l trng khi git cht c: - Thng khi bn c cht = (st thng c nhn phi) X (min $ phng chi) IV. Cch bn c n gin v hiu qu: - Bn c theo n: Chng ta s bn n lin tc vo n c khi chng xut hin v hy thc hin bn vo gia n c, vy nn n c cng ng chng ta cng d kim c nhiu $ hn. - Bn c n l: Vi nhng con c bi n l s s dng bn tng vin n. - Bn c mp, nng tin c, c to: Cch chi ny ch dnh cho nhng ai c mt khon tin kh cao. Khi bn s khng phi bn nhng con c linh tinh ch c 1 - 2 $ m hy bn lun nhng con c mp, nhng con c to v nng tin c. S dng n nhiu tin nht (thng l sng 4 hoc sng 5 ) v mi ln bn trng bn s gy ra st thng gp 8 10 ln bnh thng - Sn c Mp Vng: Khi c Mp Vng xut hin, chng ta tp trung vo mc tiu l c Mp Vng v nh n ln tc. Khi trng n, mc mu ca C Mp Vng s gim xung cho n khi ht mu th C Mp Vng s cht. Lc ny bn sn c C Mp Vng v c thng mt lng $ cc ln.

CCH CHI Lut chi Ti Xu v cng n gin, ai cng c th nm c. Ngi chi t tin vo 1 trong 2 ca: Ti hoc Xu. Khi c kt qu, nu ngi chi on ng th s nhn c gp i s tin cc. Nu on sai th s mt ton b s tin cc. Thi gian cho mt vn chi ch vn vn 60s, nn ngi chi hon ton c th gp thp s tin ca mnh ln mt cch v cng nhanh chng. Chnh v li chi n gin, nhanh chng nh vy, m Ti Xu lun nm trong top nhng ta game c game th tm kim v tham gia chi nhiu nht. CCH TNH IM Ngi thng cuc s nhn c s tin gp i s tin cc 2% ph. MINI GAME CHN L L GAME G? Nu bn l tn ca ti xu minigame hot nht trn Cng game thu ht hng nghn ngi tham gia th chc chn s khng th b qua game CHN L. Mt ta game th v khng km cnh ra mt ngi chi vi li chi n gin, d chi d thng. Tuy nhin ngi chi cn c s tnh ton hp l v a ra nhng phn on chnh xc mang li kt qu nh mong i. CCH CHI Cch chi kh n gin, ngi chi ch cn t tin vo 2 ca chn hoc l v ch i kt qu. Thi gian cho 1 vn chi l 60s. Sau khi xc xong tng im ca 3 mt xc xc s c dng xc nh kt qu ca vn cc. Nu bn a ra d on chnh xc th s c gp i s tin cc. Ngc li d on sai bn s mt ton b s tin cc. CCH TNH IM Ngi thng cuc s nhn c s tin gp i s tin cc -2% ph

 chi game trn di bn ch cn thc hin theo cc bc sau:
    	Chn mt trong cc mc cc bn mun : 5k, 10k, 50k, 100k, 500k
    	n "play"  bt u chi. H thng s xut hin ngu nhin mt l bi  ngi chi a ra d on l bi tip theo ca mnh.
    	Ngi chi d on l bi tip theo ln hay nh hn l bi hin ti.
    	Theo di kt qu  bit thng thua
Ch :
-Ngi chi s c thi gian l 2p cho mi ln d on.
-Ht thi gian 2p ngi chi khng a ra d on th h thng s t ng chuyn sang "Lt mi"
-Trong trng hp ngi chi  n play nhng khng a ra d on  lt tip theo( ngha l qu thi gian s on 2p) . H thng s la chn ngu nhin mt p n cho ngi chi. NPH khuyn co bn nn a ra p n trong thi gian 2p  khng b mt tin.
-Mi lt d on ng s c mt mc thng khc nhau. Nu on ng bn s c s tin tng ng, nu on sai s b tr s tin bng mc cc bn u.
-Nu bn mun nhn tin thng hay khng mun tip tc d on th c th chn "lt mi".
-Trng hp khi d on l bi tip theo xut hin c cng gi tr vi l bi hin ti( khng phn bit cht) th h thng s t ng trch 10% s tin t ca ngi chi vo Jackpot v lt chi tip tc.

<color=yellow>QU THNG</color>

     Ging nh cc minigame khc, game trn di c qu thng cc k khng. Vi mc cc cng cao th qu thng cng ln. Khi ngi chi thng lin tip trong cng mt phin chi. ng thi s hu 3 trong 4 con A th s nhn c 50% qu thng.
Nu trong qu trnh chi ngi chi s hu 2 con A th c hi n h sp n gn ri nh, bn ch cn tht tnh to d on chnh xc lt tip theo l c th s hu ngay qu thng ri.

<color=yellow>Tr ph:</color>
H thng s tr thng 98% cho ngi chi

     Game Bu Cua i thng l mt mini game cc k ph bin v c sc. C th ni, cng vi Ti Xu, th Bu Cua cng l mt tr chi c chi nhiu nht t trc n nay! Bu cua t lu  tr thnh mt mn n tinh thn khng th thiu ca ngi dn Vit Nam. Vi li chi n gin, bt c ai cng c th hc v chi c ngay lp tc. Nh  ni  trn, game bu cua cng vi ti xu  tr thnh b i game ng ph cc ph bin v thu ht ng o ngi chi tham gia.

Game bu cua s dng 3 vin xc xc c 6 mt, mi mt s c 1 hnh tng ng vi hnh trn  t cc: Huu  G  Tm  C  Bu  Cua.
	M u vn chi, ngi chi s c 60 giy  t cc (t ti a 3 ca). Sau  h thng s tin hnh tung xc xc. Ngi chi s da vo s hnh trn   phn nh thng thua:
	Nu trng 1 hnh, ngi chi s c 1 ln tin cc, trng 2 hnh c 2 ln tin cc, trng c 3 hnh s c 3 ln tin cc.
	Nu khng trng hnh no, ngi chi s mt ton b s tin cc.
Ngoi ra, ngi chi s c c hi s hu s tin thng hng tun.Vi mi 1000 tin thng c, ngi chi s c tch ly 1 im cho  thng cc. Ngi chi c im tch ly cao nht tng ng vi mi  tnh n 23h59 Ch nht hng tun, s c tham gia ginh qu thng v phn chia tin qu. S % tin qu theo tun l khc nhau, cc bn ch  nh!

Hn na, khi chi game bu cua i thng trn cng game, ngi chi s c c tri nghim v cng tuyt vi. Chi hay, i thng ngay vi nhng qu tng v vt phm gi tr. Cn chn ch g na m khng CHI NGAY!

<color=yellow><size = 25>VNG QUAY MAY MN</size></color>
